name: PajaRunner22_Proto
description:
Playable proto of a school project, arcade-y wallrunner, against the clock.  Hop your way to the end following the green lights, as fast ass possible.

Proto consists of very basic mechanics in a short and simple level. No Audio yet, and only the playable scene in the build (Main Menu button for example doesn't do anything, as the Menu wasn't included in this build. Finishing the run will also only pause game instead of taking you to a scoreboard as planned).

WASD to move, space to Jump, Shift to Sprint (you'll want to sprint most of the time). ESC for pause menu.

Known issues:

- Restarting the level sometimes bugs the timer for the duration of initial countdown (will start and run normally after)

- Pausing/Resuming the game overrides countdown at start and stop at the finish.

- There's an annoying gap between the middle section and the frame of the wall elements.
